issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
i am trying to add image in PDF generated using jsPDF for iPhone 
but i can not add image in PDF anyway...
fields.summary: how can i add image in PF

comments.body: This is likely a better question for the Q&A, not a ticket. Ask this in the Q&A and you'll likely get a response from someone who has done something similar before: http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/newest
Closing this since it is NOT a bug report. A recommendation on how to resolve this has been posted.
